blackdoor.cqbe.certificate

Class CertificateBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackdoor.cqbe.certificate.CertificateBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder

    public class CertificateBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Builder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CertificateBuilder()
      Create a new un-configured CertificateBuilder object.
      CertificateBuilder(CertificateProtos.Certificate certificate)
      Create a new CertificateBuilder that is ready to sign and build a certificate based on certificate.
      CertificateBuilder(java.io.File certificateDescriptor)
      Create a new Certificate Builder that is ready to build a self signed certificate based on the fields in certificateDescriptor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CertificateBuilder

        public CertificateBuilder()
        Create a new un-configured CertificateBuilder object. Before this object is used the fields of the certificate will need to be entered either by setting the certificate object, or by pointing to a file that has the certificate settings in it.

      • CertificateBuilder

        public CertificateBuilder(java.io.File certificateDescriptor)
        Create a new Certificate Builder that is ready to build a self signed certificate based on the fields in certificateDescriptor.
        Parameters:
        certificateDescriptor - a JSON file that describes the field content for the certificate being built.

      • CertificateBuilder

        public CertificateBuilder(CertificateProtos.Certificate certificate)
        Create a new CertificateBuilder that is ready to sign and build a certificate based on certificate.
        Parameters:
        certificate -

    • Method Detail

      • setCertObject

        public void setCertObject(CertificateProtos.Certificate certificate)
        If one of the parameterized constructors was not used to build this object then configuration will need to be set with this method before build is called.
        Parameters:
        certificate - the certificate object to build from.

      • setCertObject

        public void setCertObject(java.io.File certificateDescriptor)
        If one of the parameterized constructors was not used to build this object then configuration will need to be set with this method before build is called.
        Parameters:
        certificateDescriptor - a JSON file that describes the field content for the certificate to be built.

      • getCertObject

        public CertificateProtos.Certificate getCertObject()
        Retrieves the Certificate object that will be used to build the certificate when build is called.
        Returns:
        the Certificate object that will be used to build the certificate when build is called.

      • build

        public byte[] build(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey)
             throws BuilderException,
                    java.security.KeyException
        Build and sign a certificate with privateKey. The certificate configuration needs to be set before this method is called.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder
        Parameters:
        privateKey - the private key to sign this certificate with, must match the key information on the certificate.
        Returns:
        TODO a file or array of bytes or something that represents the certificate.
        Throws:
        java.security.KeyException - thrown if privateKey does not match the public key in the certificate configuration
        BuilderException
